attributes.additional_details:
Signing this means objecting to Hyde Housing building a big supermarket on the corner of Packington St (opposite St James Church). Why? my awesome family run off-licence and many other small businesses will suffer.... It will also stop the Precinct Theatre from operating.. an important resource for young people.

This application (# P112904) will be heard on the 26th July 7.30 pm... so sign and come along to show your support!!
